message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's a great deal, and I know you'll appreciate its value. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to pay closer to $11,000. This product is worth $10,000 to you, so I think this is a fair price for both of us. Let's see if we can work something out.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $11,000 is still a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?  I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you. Let's make this deal happen!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $12,000 is still a bit high for me.  How about we settle at $11,500?  This would be a fair compromise and would still give you a good profit.

Bob, I appreciate you coming up a bit, but $11,500 is still not quite there.  I'm willing to come down to $12,500. It's a fair price for both of us, and it's a deal you won't regret! Let's finalize this.
